insert all into yomi_order (id, order_date, user_id) values (#{orderNum}, sysdate, (select id from yomi_user where username = #{username}))
into yomi_pay (id, pay_date, pay_result, order_id) values (yomi_pay_seq.nextval, sysdate, 'paid', #{orderNum})
into yomi_delivery (id, delivery_state, order_id) values (yomi_delivery_seq.nextval, '준비중', #{orderNum})
into yomi_orderdetail (amount, recipient_name, recipient_postnumber, recipient_city, recipient_street, recipient_location, item_id, order_id, total_price) values (#{amountList}, #{name}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{extraAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{itemIdList}, #{orderNum}, #{amount}) select * from dual
